thread.title: Charles S. - Cleveland OH
thread.title_full: 1000Bulbs.com reviewed by Charles S. - Cleveland OH

author: Charles S. - Cleveland OH
title: Charles S. - Cleveland OH
text: Some retailers make you buy kits with parts you don't need. It was great getting exactly the ballasts I needed without any of the extras that add cost without adding value. I appreciated how easy it was to match the equipment that's installed in my building and get it shipped fast!
